| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) |

| 16 | 2, 4, 10, 5, 11, 7, 13, 15 | #P_djhsumss | |- ( ph -> ( ( I ` X ) .(+) ( I ` Y ) ) C_ ( ( I ` X ) ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) ( I ` Y ) ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 3, 2, 6, 11 | #P_djhlj | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( I ` ( X .\/ Y ) ) = ( ( I ` X ) ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) ( I ` Y ) ) ) |
